activities: Calgon Carbon Corporation acts as a data controller and data processor with respect to personal information as further defined in its Safe Harbor Policy.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Calgon Carbon Corporation is a member of EthicsPoint, a third party provider of a hotline through which employees may submit complaints.
recoursemech: Calgon Carbon Corporation will use the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for dispute resolution.
